config.title: Babyzzu ©
config.description: Babyzzu is a platform that allows you to create personalized pages for special people.
config.keywords: love, relationship, friendships, birthday, gift, page, dedication, surprise

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.description: We use cookies to ensure the best experience on our site. By continuing to browse, you agree to our Privacy Policy.

hero.description: Small gestures make all the difference. Show your affection in an unexpected way by creating a dedicated page for someone special.

input.placeholder: E.g., John & Mary or Happy Birthday or etc.

how-work.subtitle: How does it work?
how-work.title: Create the page in 4 steps

1.title: 1. Creation form

2.title: 2. Secure payment

3.title: 3. QR Code and link

themes.title: Choose the ideal theme

1.title: Default

2.title: Netflix

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Here are some frequently asked questions to help you better understand Babyzzu. If you have any questions, contact us.

1.question: What is Babyzzu?
1.answer: Babyzzu is a platform that allows you to create personalized pages for special people. You can add photos, a message, and also the time of the union.

2.question: How can I create a personalized page on Babyzzu?
2.answer: To create your personalized page, follow the steps by completing the form with the requested information. After completing it, you will be directed to payment.

3.question: What is included in my personalized page?
3.answer: Your personalized page will include everything you complete in the form, depending on the chosen plan.

4.question: How do I receive my personalized page after payment?
4.answer: After payment confirmation, you will receive a QR code and a link by email to share and access the page.

5.question: Does the personalized page have validity?
5.answer: Yes, in the basic plan, the page will be available for 1 year. In the advanced plan, the page will be lifetime.

6.question: How long does it take to receive the QR code by email?
6.answer: Payments with Credit Card and PIX are processed immediately.

7.question: What payment methods are accepted?
7.answer: We accept payments with Credit Card or Pix.

8.question: How can I contact customer support?
8.answer: You can contact customer support by email: contact@babyzzu.com.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.description: See what our customers are saying about Babyzzu

1.name: Mariana and John
1.message: I loved the experience! I was able to create a special page for John with our favorite photos, a personalized playlist, and a text that represents our story. He was very moved when he saw it!

2.name: Ana and Pedro
2.message: With Babyzzu, I was able to express my love in a totally different way. I loved creating a page just for the two of us.

3.name: Lucas and Carol
3.message: I made a surprise page for Carol, with our travel photos and a sincere message. She loved it! I will definitely use it again.

4.name: Camila and Felipe
4.message: The interface is simple and creating a page with our favorite photos and songs was super special!

5.name: Bia and Enrique
5.message: The page turned out amazing and personalized! I didn't expect something so exciting.

6.name: Clara and Rafael
6.message: Using Babyzzu was incredible! The platform is very intuitive and easy to use. We were able to create a perfect digital gift with songs that marked our relationship.

7.name: Vanessa and Ricardo
7.message: Babyzzu made our relationship even more special. He loved the surprise full of memories.

8.name: Carla and Bruno
8.message: We celebrated our first year together in a very special way. The personalized page was the perfect gift!

9.name: Larissa and Tiago
9.message: I didn't expect such a personalized surprise. It was exciting to create this page with everything we love.

plans.title: Our Plans
plans.description: Choose the ideal plan for your personalized page. You can choose from the plans below.

features.title: Various Features
features.description: See the features you can add to your personalized page

1.title: Time counter
1.description: Show how long you've been together with a real-time counter.

2.title: Background animations
2.description: Choose from various background animations to personalize the page.

3.title: Dedicated music
3.description: Dedicate a special song. The song will play automatically on the page.

4.title: Anywhere
4.description: Create your page and share it from anywhere in the world. We accept international payments.

content.introduction_description: Your privacy is extremely important to us. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information when using our platform.
content.information_we_collect: We collect the following information when using our platform:
content.registration_info: • Registration Information: Name, start date of the relationship, personalized message, couple's photos, and email address.
content.payment_info: • Payment Information: The email registered with Stripe or Pagar.me / Stone to process the payment and send the personalized page link.
content.use_payment_process: • Process the payment and send the personalized page link via email.
content.use_personalize_page: • Personalize and create the couple's page with the provided information.
content.use_improve_service: • Improve our services and customer support.
content.sharing_information: We do not share your personal information with third parties, except when necessary to process payments (Stripe and Pagar.me / Stone) or as required by law.
content.security_description: We adopt appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no data transmission over the internet is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
content.data_retention_description: We will retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, or as required by law.
content.your_rights_description: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. To exercise these rights, please contact us via email: contact@babyzzu.com.
content.changes_to_policy_description: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. When this occurs, the “last updated” date at the top of this page will be changed. It is your responsibility to review this policy periodically to stay informed about any modifications.
content.contact_description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us via email: contact@babyzzu.com.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.description: By accessing and using our platform, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use the platform. Last updated: 01/09/2024

content.acceptance_description: By accessing and using our platform, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use the platform.
content.service_description: Babyzzu offers a service that allows couples to create a personalized page by filling out a form with their names, the start date of the relationship, a special message, and up to 8 media files. After filling out the form, the couple is directed to payment, and upon completion, they receive a link with a QR Code sent via email.
content.registration_and_security: To use our services, you must provide a valid email address. We will not share your email with third parties.
content.privacy_policy: We value your privacy. Your data will not be processed or sold to third parties. The email provided will be used exclusively to send the link to your personalized page.
content.user_content: You are solely responsible for the content you enter on the platform, including photos, messages, and information about the relationship. We are not responsible for inappropriate or illegal content uploaded by users.
content.payments_refund_policy: Payments are processed through Stripe and Pagar.me / Stone. After payment confirmation, the couple will receive a link to access the personalized page via email. Refunds are not offered, except in exceptional cases, at our sole discretion.
content.service_changes: We are committed to keeping the service available during the contracted period, according to the chosen plan (1 year in the basic plan or lifetime in the advanced plan). However, in extraordinary situations, such as technical, legal, or financial issues, we reserve the right to modify or discontinue the service. In case of discontinuation, we will notify users in advance and seek to offer suitable alternatives whenever possible. Babyzzu is not responsible for losses resulting from modifications or interruptions in extraordinary circumstances, but we will make efforts to minimize impacts.
content.limitation_of_liability: We will not be liable for indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages related to the use or inability to use the platform.
content.terms_update: We may revise these Terms of Use periodically. When this occurs, we will update the “last updated” date at the top of this page. It is your responsibility to review the Terms of Use periodically to stay informed about any changes.
content.contact: If you have any questions about the Terms of Use, please contact us via email: contact@babyzzu.com

continue.title: Do you want to continue?
continue.description: You have a page in progress. Do you want to continue from where you left off or start a new page?

step1.title: Page Title
step1.description: Write the dedicatory title for the page. E.g., John & Mary or Happy Birthday or etc!

input.placeholder: E.g., John & Mary or Happy Birthday or etc

step2.title: Message
step2.description: Write a special message. Be creative and show all your affection.

input.label: Message
input.placeholder: E.g., John, you are the most amazing person I have ever met. Thank you for everything!

step3.title: Start Date
step3.description: Enter the start date that symbolizes the beginning of a union, relationship, friendship, etc.

step4.title: Photos
step4.description: Attach photos and choose the display mode to personalize the page. You can add up to 8 photos.

errors.not-image: The file must be an image
errors.big-size: The file is too large. Maximum of 100MB

error-save.title: Error saving
error-save.description: An error occurred while saving the image. Please try again.

step5.title: Dedicated Music
step5.description: Dedicate a special song. The song will play automatically on the page.

input.label: YouTube Music
input.placeholder: E.g., Coldplay - Sky full of stars

step6.title: Background Animation
step6.description: Choose a background animation for the page. You can choose from the options below.

step7.title: Ideal Plan
step7.description: Choose the ideal plan for your page. You can choose from the plans below.
